tool_description: HHsearch performs HMM-HMM comparison, using a query HMM to search against a database of HMMs. This tool identifies distant homologs and can predict protein functions or structures.

required_parameters.name: query_hmm
required_parameters.description: A Hidden Markov Model (HMM) file, typically generated by HHmake, that will be used as the query for searching homologous HMMs.

optional_parameters.name: evalue
optional_parameters.description: The E-value threshold for reporting matches.

return_values.name: hhr_file
return_values.description: A results file summarizing the HMM-HMM matches, including E-values, probabilities, and alignments.
